thread.title: BRIEF-CRE buys back 9,200 shares for 13.8 mln yen in December 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CRE buys back 9,200 shares for 13.8 mln yen in December 2017
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - CRE Inc
* Says it repurchased 9,200 shares of its common stock for 13.8 million yen in total from Dec. 1, 2017 to Dec. 31, 2017
* Says this was part of the share repurchase plan announced on Sept. 13, 2017
* Says it accumulatively repurchased 162,400 shares for 235.2 million yen in total as of Dec. 31, 2017
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/2WQGmA
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
